game.name: SEARCH ALL - FRUITS
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: is a Hidden Object game where you have to find all the fruits in a large area. Fruits will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places
game.shortDescriptionEn: is a Hidden Object game where you have to find all the fruits in a large area. Fruits will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places

reviewHighlights.text: This is a really easy and beautiful search all game. You need to find all 100 tiny fruits to unlock all the achievements. It takes about 10 minutes to...
Very simple, small and challenging hidden object game.
